articles.description: Macclesfield's FA Cup odyssey may have ended against Brentford but they have made memories to last a lifetime, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Non-league Macclesfield almost defy FA Cup odds again

articles.description: Lamine Yamal misses a penalty before substitute Fran Beltran scores in the 86th minute as Girona stun title-chasing Barcelona in a fierce Catalan derby.
articles.title: Girona 2-1 Barcelona: Lamine Yamal misses penalty as Girona stun Barca in Catalan derby

articles.description: Freestyle skier Kirsty Muir once again comes heartbreakingly close to a Winter Olympic medal for Team GB with her second fourth-place finish of the Games.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Kirsty Muir fourth in freestyle skiing big air

articles.description: Australia's hopes of reaching the knockout stages of the T20 World Cup are all but over after Sri Lanka's Pathum Nissanka hit a brilliant unbeaten 100 to condemn them to an eight-wicket defeat in Pallekele.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Pathum Nissanka hits unbeaten 100 as Sri Lanka crush Australia

articles.description: Sports editor Dan Roan analyses the potential fallout of Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe's comments on immigration.
articles.title: Manchester United:  Sir Jim Ratcliffe immigration fallout analysed

articles.description: Coco Gauff says it is "tough to wake up" and see what is happening back home in the United States amid the president's immigration crackdown.
articles.title: Coco Gauff finds it 'tough' to hear news from the US amid President Trump's immigration crackdown

articles.description: Follow live text commentary and radio analysis from the Championship as leaders Middlesbrough visit second-placed Coventry City.
articles.title: Coventry City v Middlesbrough LIVE: Text commentary & radio analysis

articles.description: England remain just as confident they can win the T20 World Cup despite their unconvincing group stage, says batter Will Jacks.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England still confident despite unconvincing group stage, says Will Jacks

articles.description: Man Utd consider swoop for Liverpool's Alexis Mac Allister, Man City not keen on James Trafford sale, Nicolas Jackson to return to Chelsea from Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Football gossip: Mac Allister, Trafford, Jackson, Williams, El Mala, McTominay

articles.description: Jannik Sinner enjoys a comfortable victory in his first match since losing to Novak Djokovic in the Australian Open semi-finals.
articles.title: Qatar Open: Jannik Sinner wins first match since Australian Open
